description: A man in formal attire and a pith helmet struggles uphill across loose sand, carrying a large water-dispensing device and a rifle. He appears distressed, sweating profusely under the hot sun towards a large palm tree whose extensive roots are exposed. The situation presents an absurd contrast between the strenuous effort and the potential for a natural oasis suggested by the palm tree. His peculiar gear, including a weapon and a likely water carrier, seems counter-intuitive for merely reaching the tree. This highlights the surreal struggle against the environment despite possessing tools seemingly meant to aid survival or exploration.
caption: null
